channel.title: My Developer Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on My Developer Portfolio

item.description: About me Smart Kind Some info

Programming Skills My programming skills are already quite versatile and I’m always ready to learn more. Most used languages are: Python TypeScript Rust C I’m the most familiar with following techs: MySQL/MariaDB ElasticSearch Express.js Selenium (with Python) AWS Currently learning/using: WebAssembly (My thesis researches using WASM to process audio ðŸŽµ) Rust (This language feels like the future’s C) Hugo CMS1 (This web site was made with Hugo ðŸ˜‰) CMS = Content Management System ↩︎

My Projects Below are a few of my projects that I’ve made during my studies or on my free time. Most of these are pure passion projects which I have made because I have wanted to learn some tool, technology or I have wanted test implementing some algorithm. Battleship Game (with hunting algorithm) A game of battleship agains AI using hunting algorithm. The game is made in Python is modular in a sense that players can be used to do another things like playing completely another game by creating an interface for the player!

Soft Skills I’m generally quite outwards person and I like to converse with people. I would say that my strong suit is learning new things and helping others to learn the things I’ve learned along the way. What I would like to improve is my time management. In 2023, I want to incorporate the usage of calendar (yes, calendar ðŸ“…) to my workflow to manage time and resources. Overall, I have enjoyed working with people in daily basis but I also appreciate the quietness that comes along the profession called software developer.
